    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      byte[] AID
      3 bytes Application Identifies.
      int cryptoMode
      the key type of application, 0 - DES/3DES key, 1 - 3KDES key, 2 - AES key
      byte[] DFName
      16 bytes "DF-name" used in 7816-4 mode in combination with the ISO SELECT command
      boolean hasDFName
      if false - does not carries "DF-name" else create.
      byte[] ISOFID
      2 bytes ISO/IEC 7816-4 File Identifies for files
      boolean IsSupFID
      whether use File Identifies
      boolean IsSupISOFID
      whether use of 2 byte ISO/IEC 7816-4 File Identifies for files within the Application
      int masterKeySetting
      Application master key setting
      int numberOfKey
      Number of keys that can be stored within the application
      int RFU
